bio:
have been a freelance cartoonist and illustrator for over 25 years.  Working with a wide range of organizations, my graphics appearing in many publications, websites and on conference walls.

Originally I studied computer science and worked as a youth worker in Port Adelaide.

Both turned out to be good training for work as a cartoonist.

Although I reckon cartoons/illustrations can tackle just about any issue, over the years I seem to have specialised in creating tailored graphics in the areas of social issues, health, community, education, science, agriculture and the environment.

I use graphics as a means of communicating ideas and information, and using positive depictions and humour to engage the reader.

bio:
At ACube, we help transform your business challenges Into growth opportunities. Our IT services are geared to provide the best tools and processes for your business success. ACube has been offering software development services to global clients in the U.S., Canada, Europe, Australia, and Egypt since 2010

Why clients choose ACube?
- Domain Experience over Various verticals 
- Faster Service Quick response time  
- Product Features Strong technology competency  
- Work From anywhere flexible engagement models  
- Value for Money                                                                                                
- Pre-defined Implementation   
- Flexibility        
- Seamless communication.
- State of the art IT infrastructure
- On-Premise/Cloud
- Excellent Customer Service, Integrity, Trust

Our vision: Attempting to provide world-class services, we always strive to provide you with quality work and consider “every effort counts”. Excellent and  and consistent quality at low cost is what drives outsourcing business. 

What we do?
We Plan, Produce, Implement and Support Information Technology (IT) solutions for your needs deriving it from Business point of view rather than technology.

Executive Summary
WEB AND MOBILE DEVELOPMENT     
BUSINESS ENGAGE ANALYTICS     
AI, BI & IoT, Cloud     
AUTOMATION AND DEVOPS

Business Verticals   
• Pioneer in Healthcare Industries helped to build Healthcare products and company to grow from startup to Inc,5000.   
• Mental Healthcare and Child development.  
• 2D/3D Game Development  
• Trading and Logistics  
• DevOps & Cloud Infra Maintenance  
• Automations / RPA  
• B2B and E-Commerce Solutions  
• Oil and Gas   
• Food Safety Industry

Experts in PHP | ASP.NET | Angular JS | React JS | Big Data | Java | iPhone | Android | HTML5 |SHOPIFY | JOOMLA |MVC| Website Development | Ajax | API |Database Management| Jquery | Responsive web design |  Python | MAGENTO | BOOTSTRAPS |CODE IGNITER| Node| Golang| Java SQL| SQLite

Hire Dedicated developers: If you are looking for cost effective full stack team to support your frontend and backend development, our team of full stack developer mastering in Frontend technologies such as PHP, ASP.NET, Python, React and Angular and backend/database such as Node, GoLang, Java, SQL, SQLite, or MongoDB. We provide dedicated Full stack developers for hire at quick turnaround time.  
• All developers are bound by strict confidentiality and privacy NDAs 
• State-of-the-art infrastructure with secure firewalls and IP protection systems. 
• Our Android App developers are well-versed with Agile development methodology. 
• Developers well versed in English communication and can integrate well into your team. 
• A rigorous QA testing process to ensure your App will work across all Android devices. 
• A developer assigned to you is solely dedicated to your project. This ensures the highest quality delivered to you

Fixed Cost Projects:
ACube requests a deposit of 50% of the quoted cost during project startup and the remaining 50% due upon final completion which follows a review of the project by the client.

Communication:
Email, Ticket System, Instant messenger, GoToMeeting or Any Web Ex based communications, help desk and Issue Tracker.

Availability:
Round-the-clock every day of the week.

Development control:
Facility for clients to continually monitor work progress.

- A developer assigned to you is solely dedicated to your project. This ensures the highest quality delivered to you.

abstrac: Building efficient and cutting-edge solutions for desktop, web and communication with my skills in programming, development and VoIP expertise
bio:
As an experienced and accomplished IT professional with over 29 years in the industry, I bring a diverse set of skills to the table, including expertise in programming languages such as VB.net, C#, ASP.net, MVC, PHP, C++, Java, Angular, ASP.NET Core 2, Laravel, VBA, JavaScript, and more.

My experience with web development technologies like WordPress, eCommerce, Nodes.js, HTML5, CSS, MySQL, SQL server, Adobe Muse, Adobe Dreamweaver, allows me to build and customize various types of websites to meet the unique needs of my clients. My ability to work with legacy technologies like Visual Basic 6, Visual Studio .net 2022, and VS Code, means I can continue to provide support for systems that are still running smoothly even with new or advanced technology.

I also have experience with various cloud platforms such as Microsoft Azure and Google Cloud, which enables me to develop scalable and secure solutions that are easily accessible from any location. My proficiency with databases such as MySQL, SQL Server, and others, allows me to manage and maintain a wide range of data-driven applications.

In addition, I am proficient in Microsoft Office, Access, Excel, Word, Outlook, image editing software like Paint Shop, Photoshop, RealDraw, version control system like Git, and comfortable working with a variety of operating systems including Windows, Mac, Linux, Ubuntu, Chrome. My experience with VoIP technologies and Arduino further extends my skillset to enhance communication and control functionality for my clients.

I am a skilled communicator, collaborator, and problem-solver. I understand the importance of transparent and timely communication, and I work closely with my clients to ensure that their needs are met and that they are satisfied with the final product.

With my years of experience, technical skills, and ability to adapt to the needs of my clients, I am confident that I can deliver innovative, high-quality solutions that will help your organization reach its goals.

My work terms are flexible and can be tailored to meet the specific needs of my clients.

Communication: I believe that clear and regular communication is essential to the success of any project. I will keep you informed of progress and any issues that arise, and I am always available to answer any questions you may have.

Payment: I typically bill on an hourly basis, with payment due at the end of each week or upon completion of the project, whichever comes first. I am open to discussing other payment arrangements if they would better suit your needs.

revisions: I am committed to delivering high-quality work that meets your requirements and I understand that changes may be required during the course of a project. I will work with you to make revisions as needed and make sure you are satisfied with the final product.

Ownership: The code and all related materials produced during the course of the project will be owned by you and your company.

Confidentiality: I understand the importance of protecting sensitive information and will maintain confidentiality throughout the project and beyond.

Deadlines: I understand the importance of meeting deadlines and will work diligently to ensure that the project is completed on time, without sacrificing quality.

I am always looking to build long-term relationships with my clients, and I am committed to providing the best possible service. I look forward to the opportunity to work with you.
